message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at a price of $9,500. I believe it offers significant value at this price point, especially considering its worth to you. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your perspective on the value, but I can't go as low as $8,500.  How about we meet in the middle at $9,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $8,750?
